name: Safe Robber 2
description:
Another day, another neighborhood. But this one is more difficult.

The plan seems simple: enter a house and place a fake green safe in the same spot as the real one so you can steal it.

Good luck!

Controls

Move: Arrow keys, WASD, controller sticks or D-pad

Undo: Z, controller East button

Reset: R, controller North button (resets are undoable)

Toggle Map: M, controller West button
